short_description: The BBSR provides data for test reference years TRY. The TRY provide climate data for the evaluation of thermal behvaviour of buildings. The data can be downloaded for free, but an user account is necessary from this webpage.
provider: Bundesinstitut für Bau-, Stadt- und Raumforschung

short_description: CCWorldWeatherGen is an Excel-based tool, that transforms present weather files into files compatible with building perfomance simulation programs.
ICOS provides high-quality and standardised data on greenhouse gases

data_service: The Central Europe Refined analysis version 1 (CER v1)
